translations: 橡胶底帆布鞋（等于 sneakers）

sentences.sentence: We wear plimsolls when doing physical exercises.
sentences.translation: 我们体育锻炼时穿帆布球鞋。

sentences.sentence: We wear plimsolls when doing physical exercises at school.
sentences.translation: 我们在学校运动时都穿帆布球鞋。

sentences.sentence: Feeling vulnerable in my plimsolls, I swapped them for Wellington boots bought at one of the settlements along the way.
sentences.translation: 由于觉得橡胶底帆布鞋很脆弱，我换上在途中一个居民点所买的惠灵顿长筒靴。
